price: ߌ ߦߋ߫ ߓߊ ߥߊ߲ߛߊ߲ߣߍ߲ ߕߏ߫ ( ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߢߍ߫ )، ߓߊߏ߬ ߞߟߍ߬ߓߏߟߏ߲߫ ߖߌ-ߘߐ-ߕߏߕߊ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬
arabic: وَٱتۡرُكِ ٱلۡبَحۡرَ رَهۡوًاۖ إِنَّهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّغۡرَقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'ruki al-baḥra rahwan innahum jundun mugh'raqūna
